bill.title: Construction contracts; authorize attorney's fees in action to compel production of the contract and bond.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 31-5-55, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize The Award Of Attorney's Fee In An Action By A Person Supplying Labor And Materials For A Construction Project To Compel The Contractor To Furnish A Certified Copy Of The Contract And Bond For A Project; To Amend Section 87-7-5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Require A Contractor Who Receives Any Payment From The Owner Under A Nonpublic Construction Contract To Post A Notice On The Jobsite In Proximity To The Construction Permits, Or In Locations Where Other Public Information Is Posted, That Contains The Amount And Date Of Payments Received From The Owner And The Unpaid Contract Balance Owed To The Contractor As Of The Date Of The Last Payment Received From The Owner; And For Related Purposes.
